attributes.action: ask Iris Robinson to get her hair done
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Iris Robinson MP for Strangford in Northern Ireland has been appearing on local television talking about her beliefs on homosexuality and how it can be cured with psychiatric treatment. This has been a shocking thing for Northern Ireland's to witness due to her dreadful hairstyle. It is unbefitting of a person in public office.

Please sign the petition to get something done about it NOW.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
